description: Using nova trunk (post revision 943). A top level CA dir is now created if you run 'run_tests.sh -N'. Ws should bzr ignore this dir.
title: bzr ignore the top level CA dir

comments.content: Using nova trunk (post revision 943). A top level CA dir is now created if you run 'run_tests.sh -N'. Ws should bzr ignore this dir.
